title: White House bulldozes Rose Garden to pave over it
shortDescription: The White House has bulldozed the Rose Garden to make way for President Trump's plans to pave over it. See photos of the historic landmark through the years.

title: Trump toy tariffs: Supreme Court won't speed decision on challenge
shortDescription: The high court denied a request by a family-owned toy company to expedite a review of their tariff challenge.

title: Trump calls for special prosecutor to investigate 2020 election
shortDescription: Trump's efforts to challenge the 2020 election failed in court. Independent reviews and members of his own administration dismissed his fraud claims.

title: Trump issued these new holiday proclamations. What about Juneteenth?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has issued new proclamations for the Gulf of America Day, WWI and WWII. Did Trump acknowledge Juneteenth, a non-working holiday?

title: Trump says US 'may' or 'may not' strike Iran | The Excerpt
shortDescription: MAGA infighting grows on the issue of US role in Israel-Iran conflict. Plus, Karen Read has been acquitted of murder. It's all on The Excerpt.

title: Newsom reacts to Trump's National Guard court win
shortDescription: California Governor Gavin Newsom and President Donald Trump responded to a court decision to let Trump retain California National Guard power.

title: Lawmakers propose banning ICE, law enforcement from wearing masks
shortDescription: Two Democrats have introduced California legislation that would require law enforcement officers to identify themselves.

title: Trump to decide on role in Israel-Iran conflict within 2 weeks | The Excerpt
shortDescription: The Los Angeles Dodgers say they denied federal agents access. Plus, Trump signs an executive order delaying a ban on TikTok. It's on The Excerpt.

title: After Trump offer, Iran says no nuke talks without ceasefire: Live
shortDescription: "There is no room for negotiations with the U.S. until Israeli aggression stops," Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi said on June 20.

title: White House sidesteps question on Juneteenth celebrations
shortDescription: White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said she is "not tracking" the president's signature on a Juneteenth proclamation.

title: Trump can retain control of California National Guard, appeals court rules
shortDescription: An appeals court let Donald Trump retain control over California's National Guard while the state's governor proceeds with a lawsuit challenging the president.

title: Trump knocks 'non-working federal holidays' on Juneteenth
shortDescription: President Donald Trump opined on Truth Social that there are "too many non-working holidays in America," and they are harming the nation's economy.

title: Potential 2028 Dems shy away from ruling on care for some transgender minors
shortDescription: Potential 2028 Democrats largely shied away from the Supreme Court's latest ruling on care for some transgender youth.

title: Trump to decide on Iran strike within two weeks
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he will make a decision on striking Iran within two weeks as he waits on possible negotiations, the White House says.

title: President Trump extends the Tiktok deadline ban
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed an executive order extending the deadline to ban Tiktok.

title: Trump delays TikTok ban - again
shortDescription: The 90-day extension marks the third time that Trump has delayed a TikTok sell-or-ban law from going into effect after it it was passed by Congress.

title: Trump sees 'substantial chance' of talks with Iran
shortDescription: Trump said he would decide within two weeks whether to bomb Iran's nuclear facilities.

title: Democrats want new leaders, Reuters/Ipsos poll finds
shortDescription: Kamala Harrisâ€™ November loss to Donald Trump has left the party rudderless and sparked a round of soul-searching about the path forward.

title: Comparing Trump, Biden, and Obama's immigration tactics
shortDescription: Lucas Guttentag, Professor of the Practice of Law, at Stanford University, explains how recent administrations have approached deportations.

title: Did Barack Obama deport more people than Donald Trump?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has called on ICE to arrest more people, especially in Democratic cities. But he does not yet hold the title deporter in chief.

title: Trump's National Guard immigration enforcement could divide states
shortDescription: The Trump administration is considering using the National Guard for immigration enforcement, setting up a possible states' rights showdown.
